tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE proteomics_data (
  experiment_id INT NOT NULL,
  protein_id INT NOT NULL,
  peptide_sequence VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  source_database VARCHAR(50),
  spectral_count INT,
  peptide_evidence TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (experiment_id, protein_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Proteins (
    protein_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_name STRING,
    protein_sequence STRING,
    source_id UUID,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name STRING,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
    researcher_name STRING,
    source_id UUID,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE protein_data (
  protein_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  protein_sequence TEXT,
  protein_mass DOUBLE PRECISION,
  source_id UUID REFERENCES proteomics_data_source(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_id UUID REFERENCES protein_data(protein_id),
  experiment_type VARCHAR(50),
  experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
  result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Proteins (protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	protein_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	source_id INT,
	sequence TEXT,
	molecular_weight DECIMAL(10,2))

CREATE TABLE Peptides (peptide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	peptide_sequence TEXT NOT NULL,
	protein_id INT,
	start_position INT,
	end_position INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES Proteins(protein_id))

CREATE TABLE Experiments (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	date_conducted DATE,
	researcher_id INT)

CREATE TABLE PeptideIdentification (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	peptide_id INT,
	experiment_id INT,
	confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2),
	FOREIGN KEY (peptide_id) REFERENCES Peptides(peptide_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiments(experiment_id))

CREATE TABLE Researchers (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
	affiliation VARCHAR(255))
